Not all the forms need all the functionalities of XrmServiceToolkit, so does it make sence to break down the XrmServiceToolkit into mulitple files, say, 4 files: Common, Rest, Soap, Extension
so that developer can decide if extra file/functionality needed on per form base?

Hi There.

With 2.1 version, a minified version has released for production server. I do not have plans currently to split the toolkit into multiple files, but there are plans to continuously improve the performance of the toolkit.

Kind Regards,
Jaimie
